slides.quote: “Just when I lost faith in the banking system, you guys showed up. Thank you for helping to change the world.”
slides.author: Francisco V.

slides.quote: “Great customer service! Great interest rate. Reimbursements on ATM withdrawals. Sustainability conscious. World conscious.”
slides.author: Spencer J.

slides.quote: “Love the fact that you are helping the world and your customers. A win win situation.”
slides.author: Dawn B.
